sourcesContent:
<template>
    <BCard title="Home Page" style="margin:auto;width:auto" v-show="showPage">
      <BAlert :model-value="retrieveResult !== ''" :variant="errmsg" show>{{ retrieveResult }}</BAlert>
      <BOverlay :show="loading" variant="light" opacity="0.6" rounded="sm"></BOverlay>
      <Line id="my-chart-id" :options="chartOptions" :data="chartData" />
    </BCard>
</template>

<style>
#my-chart-id {
  display:block;
  position: relative;
  height: 10vh;
  width:auto;
}
</style>
<script>

import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  LineElement,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend
} from 'chart.js'

import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'

ChartJS.register(
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  LineElement,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend
)

export default {
  components: {
    Line
  },
  name: 'HomePage',
  props: ['showPage'],
  data() {
    return {
      loading: false,
      errmsg: '',
      retrieveResult: '',
      chartData : {
        labels: ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July'],
        datasets: [
          {
            label: '',
            borderColor: '#f87979',
            data: [0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1],
          },
        ],
      },
      chartOptions: [ {
        responsive: true,
        maintainAspectRatio: false,
        plugins: { legend: { display: false } },
        scales: {
          y: {
            ticks: {
              callback: function (value, index, ticks) {
                if (value == 0) return 'line 1';
                return '';
              },
            },
            grid: {
              display: false,
            },
          },
        },
      }]
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getTempDataFiles() {
      this.loading = true;
      this.axios.post("/api/command", {
        command: "getTempDataFiles",
        data: {}
      })
      .then(response => {
        var f = response.data;
        if (f.error !== undefined) {
          this.errmsg = "danger";
          this.retrieveResult = f.error;
        } else {
          this.errmsg = "success";
          this.retrieveResult = f.message;
        }
        this.loading = false;
      })
      .catch(error => {
        this.retrieveResult = error.message;
        this.errmsg = "danger";
        this.loading = false;
      });
    },
    getSomethingElse() {
      this.loading = true;
      this.axios.post("/api/command", {
        command: "getSomethingElse",
        data: {what: "a cup of coffee, please"}
      })
      .then(response => {
          var f = response.data;
          if (f.error !== undefined) {
            this.errmsg = "danger";
            this.retrieveResult = f.error;
          } else {
            this.errmsg = "success";
            this.retrieveResult = f.message;
          }
          this.loading = false;
        })
        .catch(error => {
          this.retrieveResult = error.message;
          this.errmsg = "danger";
          this.loading = false;
       });
    }
  },
  watch: {
  },
  mounted() {
  },
}
</script>
